In England, in the seven days to 09 November, there were 193,590 new confirmed cases (342.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 November, there were 226,718 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 15% (33,128 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 November is 8,113,757 (14,347.9 cases per 100,000 population).
